      • moveValid

        public boolean moveValid​(Piece[][] board,
                         java.lang.String oldPos,
                         java.lang.String newPos,
                         java.lang.Boolean white)
        This is a boolean method and is used to make sure that all of the moves using the queen is valid.
        Specified by:
        moveValid in class Piece
        Parameters:
        board - the playing board
        oldPos - the old position of the queen
        newPos - the new position of the queen
        white - boolean, true if it is white's turn
        Returns:
        true or false
